RecipeDef.label: Shutdown by severing cortex mainline
RecipeDef.description: Shutsdown an android by severing the connection between the brain and body.

RecipeDef.label: convert basic android
RecipeDef.description: This operation is useful for instantly and easily recruiting basic android prisoners, reprogramming their main functions so that they now work for the colony instead of against it; there is a somewhat high chance of memory corruption on failure however.

RecipeDef.label: convert advanced android
RecipeDef.description: This operation is useful for instantly and easily recruiting advanced android prisoners, reprogramming their main functions so that they now work for the colony instead of against it; there is a very high chance of memory corruption on failure however.

RecipeDef.label: remove self will
RecipeDef.description: By simply adding a firewall between the logical and emotional sides of this Android's AI. It permanently blocks them from being capable of feeling emotion or empathy, removing any personality or self will they once had; instead places the android into a permanent trance-like state, obeying every instruction given to them.

RecipeDef.label: personality change
RecipeDef.description: This operation will reprogram this android's personality to be changed to another set of traits. Giving them a different set of 3 traits that may or may not be suitable for an android.

RecipeDef.label: overclock android
RecipeDef.description: Bypass several safety measures within the artificial mind of the android, allowing for much more operations per second. Increasing workflow significantly but also mental break threshold and there is a high chance of causing memory corruption.

RecipeDef.label: install steel plating
RecipeDef.description: Completely replaces the frame of this android with steel plates, increasing damage resistance somewhat.

RecipeDef.label: install plasteel plating
RecipeDef.description: Completely replaces the frame of this android with plasteel plates, increasing damage resistance majorly.

RecipeDef.label: install composite plating
RecipeDef.description: Completely replaces the frame of this android with composite plates, increasing damage resistance hugely.

RecipeDef.label: install hydraulic frame
RecipeDef.description: Completely enhances the frame of this android with ergonomically placed hydraulic pumps.

RecipeDef.label: perform positronic rewiring
RecipeDef.description: rewires the artificial electronic mind of this android with those of positronic abilities.

RecipeDef.label: Initiate AI Evolution
RecipeDef.description: Begins the evolution of this androids AI.
